name: GTIG AI Threat Tracker 2025: Key Enterprise TTPs
description: Most relevant enterprise-layer ATT&CK techniques from GTIG's 2025 'AI Threat Tracker', including novel AI-enabled malware, real-world operations, and observed actor tradecraft.

techniques.comment: PROMPTFLUX (VBScript dropper) uses Gemini LLM API to rewrite/obfuscate its code hourly, evading AV, regenerating itself ‘just-in-time’.

PROMPTSTEAL queries LLMs (Qwen2.5, Gemini) to dynamically generate malicious single-line commands for collection and execution. FRUITSHELL (reverse shell in PowerShell, contains hardcoded AI bypass prompts).
FRUITSHELL reverse shell (PowerShell); scripts executed for attack functionality.
PROMPTSTEAL implements Python scripts to query the LLM, automate system/data theft operations.
PROMPTFLUX and PROMPTSTEAL trigger malicious code execution by interacting with public Gemini/Hugging Face APIs.
PROMPTSTEAL prompts LLM for Win commands to collect detailed system and document info; data sent to C2.
PROMPTSTEAL copies target files to staging folder before exfiltration.
PROMPTSTEAL, QUIETVAULT automate collection (searching for credentials, documents, system info) as part of their workflows.
QUIETVAULT steals GitHub/NPM tokens, discovered via AI-driven local search.
QUIETVAULT locates and exfiltrates credential files using AI-enabled search.
State and criminal actors use LLMs (Gemini, etc.) for AI-enhanced phishing lure creation (emails, content, language, wording).
Actors send spearphishing via service, including use of compromised corporate accounts (e.g., TEMP.Zagros/MUDDYCOAST).
UNC1069 leverages AI-generated deepfakes (image/video) for lures, combined with language-localized content; social engineering via Gemini.
Deepfake social engineering/Zoom SDK lures entice victim to execute/download malware.
PROMPTFLUX’s ‘Thinking Robot’ module continuously obfuscates code, disables/dodges security tools.
PROMPTFLUX writes regenerated dropper to Startup folder for persistence.
Reverse shell (FRUITSHELL) establishes remote control connection for arbitrary command execution.
PROMPTSTEAL/QUIETVAULT exfiltrate data and credentials to server or public GitHub repo.
PROMPTFLUX attempts to self-copy to removable drives, mapped network shares for intra-network spread.
Actors use compromised accounts for phishing and ongoing access (e.g. TEMP.Zagros).
Actors leverage LLMs for organization/target research, vulnerability identification, technical knowledge gathering.
Actors use Gemini to enumerate users/groups as part of pre-access or post-compromise discovery.
PROMPTSTEAL collects host system info; PROMPTFLUX uses commands with LLM support for runtime system discovery.
Actors prompt LLMs for exploitation steps; use Gemini to help exploit Windows/macOS/cloud targets.
Actors leverage Gemini output to find and exploit system/app vulnerabilities.
Custom web shell (e.g. TEMP.Zagros) generated/researched via Gemini.
AI-enabled toolkits, droppers, malware (PROMPTFLUX, PROMPTLOCK) generated via Gemini/Qwen/HuggingFace.
Marketplaces for AI-built malware, ransomware, phishing kits.
Actors use Gemini, HuggingFace API and other third-party AI services to gather target info, web research.
Actors acquire/tool AI API access to automate tradecraft or support C2.
APT42, UNC1069, others leverage Gemini translation for phishing lures, cross-language social engineering.
UNC1069 campaigns use deepfake lures to drive-by compromise via fake Zoom SDK app install.
Cloud infrastructure reconnaissance: actors use Gemini-driven reconnaissance for AWS EC2 token access.
Actor enumerates cloud infrastructure (Kubernetes, vSphere) via Gemini-guided workflow.
Actors use LLMs to gather intelligence around cloud services configuration and enumerate targets.
UNC4899 leverages Gemini for exploit/dev to augment supply chain attacks.
APT42 builds data ‘processing agent’ using Gemini to auto-generate SQL queries for sensitive data.
Automated data manipulation via AI-generated queries/scripts.
Actors use prompt engineering/social engineering (CTF, student, researcher pretexts) to bypass AI model safeguards/guardrails.
Actors use Gemini for technical knowledge research supporting intrusion and tool development.
Actors use LLMs for infrastructure discovery, learning defenses, enumerating attack surfaces.
Actors leverage prompt injection, adversarial prompt engineering (pretexting) to bypass model protections.
